metadata.name: Neighbor’s New Hobby
metadata.description:
This 1/1 NFT titled “Neighbor’s New Hobby” by Los Angeles based artist Mary Bragg is accompanied by a full-scale physical piece. 

Details about the physical piece:
Size: 36x24in
Surface: Canvas
Medium: Acrylic, Oil Pastel, Silver Leaf

*Physical piece contains minor artistic differences to the NFT*

*please reference my Twitter account @marybraggxo for photos and videos of the physical piece in all her glory! 

You will be contacted for a shipping address after your purchase is confirmed on the blockchain ❤️ 

Thank you for supporting me! :) 

Xo, Mary Bragg
